What's In The Box??? (What you may find in the tourney prize boxes)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: What's In The Box??? (What you may find in the tourney prize boxes)
By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 6, 2002 - 01:25 pm:

Wood Box
ItemDescription
CookiesA cookie with a spicy taste. Great for snacks.
Honey CandyHoney candy. Great for snacks for monsters.
MangoSweet Southern fruit. Great for monster snacks!
Mint LeafRefreshing mint leaf works on stress. Also for medicine.
NitroberryRefreshing taste removes fatigue from monsters.


Iron Box
ItemDescription
Lethe Rx 1Medicine that makes monster forget 1st trait.
Lethe Rx 2Medicine that makes monster forget 2nd trait.
Lethe Rx 3Medicine that makes monster forget 3rd trait.
Lethe Rx 4Medicine that makes monster forget 4th trait.
Lethe Rx 5Medicine that makes monster forget 5th trait.
Lethe Rx 6Medicine that makes monster forget 6th trait.
Mint LeafRefreshing mint leaf works on stress. Also for medicine.
Roast NewtA bitter taste feared by monsters. Used as medicine.
Torles WatrMineral water from overseas removes monster fatigue.


Silver Box
ItemDescription
BananaLazy monster Ape's banana. Makes your monster lazy.
CoralAccessory from the ocean bed. Also for medicine.
Evil KnifeWracky's knife. Gives "sharp Bld".
Golem FragFragment from a Golem. Gives "Hard Head".
LozengesClarifies your voice. Gives "Sweet Vox".
Mint CandyRefreshing Candy. Great to reduce stress.
Nuts OilNuts oil removes fatigue from monsters.
PollenPlant's Pollen. Gives "Soft Smell".
RibbonSuzurin's Ribbon. Gives "Eye Charm".


Gold Box
ItemDescription
Ava. HornHorn of an Avalance Beaclon. Gives "Sharp Horn".
BinocularsLets you see distant objects.Gives "Sniper".
Bajarl PotA pot that contains the spirit monster Bajarl.
BeaclnHornA Beaclon horn. Gives "Hard Skin".
CrystalPretty stones excavated from caves. Has some value.
Disc FragFragment of a monster that looks just like a Saucer Stone.
Eye DropsCleans eyes and improves eyesight. Gives "Act. View".
Gaboo SoulSoul of Gaboo. Gives "Iron Fist".
Ghost StikStick that belongs to a Ghost.
Hungr FruitIncreases stomach size. Gives "Big Eater".
MegaphoneHelps amplify voices. Gives "Loud Voice".
Mock SeedSeed of the monster Mock,who was born from an old tree.
Nail FileNecessity for proper nail care. Gives "Sharp Claw".
ScalesScales of the Dragon Kujata. Gives "Hard Scale"
ScarfA pretty scarf accessory for Hare. Gives "Fast Footwork".
SH FruitIncreases lung capacity. Gives "Big Lungs".
Toe ShoesShoes worn by a dancer. Gives "Grace Step".
WhipA whip from the mysterious monster Doodle
Worm FangFang of a Worm. Gives "Sharp Fang".


Black Box (gotten after defeating a stray monster)
ItemDescription
Cold PaintCold-resistant paint. Gives "Coldproof."
Heat PaintHeat-resistant Paint. Gives "Heatproof."
DiamondA rare jewel. Has great value.
Jill BeardA Jill beard. Gives "Cold Resis".
MarkisWingA Markis Wing. Gives "Wind Resis".
MirrorMirror with the power of the legendary monster Majin.
Monol FragA Monol fragment. Gives "Magc Resis".
Phnx FeathrA Phoenix feather. Gives "Heat Resis."
ShellHard Shell of a Niton. Gives "Hi-Tough".
Zilla BeardA Zilla beard. Gives "Watr Resis."



As you can see, the items get better with higher rank.
